content: Is the formal verification working group currently active, and if so, where do they hang out?
I'd guess that they more or less became the formal methods interest group (#wg-formal-methods ) instead.
@rylev In the discord server there's a #wg-grammar which is mainly inactive, but did have some related activity some time ago, and maybe there's some people still lurking there.
@rylev I would say that were active, though weâ€™re called the formal methods interest group now
We have monthly presentations for researchers to share their work
Awesome - thanks all! A colleague of mine might be interested in this. I'll pass the info along
Can I ask, is there a specific sub-topic they are interested in? Verifying Rust programs? Building verification tools?
